page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE. Page one.
page.content: {PAGE 1 A DAY IN MY LIFE After a good night's sleep the alarm goes and wakes me up in the middle of my dream. I try to go back to sleep but it is no use. I get up and air my bed then having got my clothes ready the night before,I get dressed into my school uniform. I draw back my curtains.I cannot see because I am used to the dark and now it is light. I have my morning drink then I run down stairs to the kitchen where I grab a bowl and have three Weetabix.Weetabix is a breakfast cereal that you eat.I then put a piece of bread in the toaster.A toaster is a machine that you use to brown your bread.I then spread marmalade on and eat it.I have my orange juice and my vitamin then I go to the hall and make my bag ready for school.Then I run upstairs,clean my teeth and wash my
